title: Joy
subject_group: Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Teenage girls
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Teenage girls
abstract: Thursday night. Joy wants to have fun.
description: Thursday night. Late night shopping. Joy wants to have fun. This film follows a teenage girl as she hits the town in search of a good time. But Joy's search for fulfilment leaves her lost and lonely at the end of the evening as we follow her to her unhappy home. By the director of Somersault (2004) Original format 35 mm/colour WARNING: This film contains scenes that may offend some viewers
